full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDAG GI BLA MA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO'I YANG SRID LHA BTZUN MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA STOBS CHEN BSOD NAMS MNGA' DBANG GI ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS BSAM DON KUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES BDAG GI BLA MA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG RDO RJE DPAL BZANG PO'I YANG SRID LHA BTZUN MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG BSTAN PA STOBS CHEN BSOD NAMS MNGA' DBANG GI ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS BSAM DON KUN GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI, T'A BLA MA'I LAS BYED PA RAB 'BYAMS PA GTZUG TOR DMAR ME BLA MA BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN, TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG BSOD NAMS RI KHROD GYI NA BA BLO BZANG TSE LDAN RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MKHAN MING BSKAL BZANG DGE 'PHEL GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
